entity.name: Cyberpunk 2077
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable.

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text:
@CyberpunkGame I'd pick a delayed & polished game than a rushed & broken game, plus it's CDPR, so I am hopeful rather than being cynical like many of the twitter dumbasses.

And some people legit forget the world is still suffering from COVID19, which affect productivity of all kinds of work.
